articles.title: 19th Int'l Meeting of Communist and Workers' Parties Held
articles.content:
19th Int'l Meeting of Communist and Workers' Parties Held
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The 19th International Meeting of Communist and Workers' Parties was held on Nov. 2 and 3 in Sankt-Peterburg, Russia.
					 It was held on the theme of "Centenary of the great October Socialist Revolution: ideal of communist movement and intensified struggle for peace and socialism against imperialists' war," bringing together more than 100 delegations and 300-odd delegates of the said parties including a delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 At the end of an opening address, a letter sent to the meeting by Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, was conveyed at the meeting.
					
					 Gennadi Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 Kim Su Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, who is heading the WPK delegation made a speech at the meeting.
					
					 There were also speeches by heads of foreign delegations.
					
					 Speakers referred to the historical significance of the October Socialist Revolution, lessons drawn from frustration of socialism in the former Soviet Union and east European countries and experience gained by some countries and regions through the struggle for socialist construction and socio-political justice.
					
					 They underscored the need to defend the cause of socialism and victoriously advance it and boost unity and solidarity among communist and workers' parties worldwide so as to cope with the undisguised reactionary offensive of the imperialists.
					
					 They sharply censured the U.S. invasion and interference in the DPRK and expressed support and solidarity to the heroic struggle of the WPK and the Korean people bravely standing up to the extreme sanctions of the U.S.
					
					 A solidarity statement to the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 "Appeal of the 19th international meeting of the communist parties and workers' parties" was adopted as the final document at the meeting.
					
					 The appeal expressed the support for Korea's peaceful reunification, opposing the U.S. interference in the issue of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It called for stepping up the joint action to defend and victoriously advance socialism and expanding anti-imperialist front to vigorously wage an action for peace against the invasion by imperialists on the occasion of the centenary of the October Socialist Revolution.

articles.title: WPK Sides with Foreign Communist and Workers' Parties
articles.content:
WPK Sides with Foreign Communist and Workers' Parties
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Su Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK who is leading the WPK delegation, on Nov. 2 made a speech at the 19th International Meeting of Communist and Workers' Parties held in Sankt-Peterburg, Russia.
					 Kim said that the great October Socialist Revolution that took place in Russia in 1917 was an epoch-making milestone in history that enabled the working masses to fulfil their long-cherished desire for an ideal society-a society free from exploitation and oppression where everybody enjoys an equitable happy life.
					
					 The history of mankind for the last century shows that capitalism, for its reactionary nature and structural contradictions, can never bring dignity and happiness to the masses of people, while socialism, with its eternal viability for its scientific accuracy and truthful nature, is the only future of mankind, said Kim, adding:
					
					 In the report to the historic Seventh Congress of the WPK, Comrade Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, declared that socialism is a common ideal of mankind, that it is a law of historical development that mankind advances socialism.
					
					 Under circumstances where there is a sharp confrontation between socialism and capitalism, the WPK has held high the banner of socialism and built socialism of our own style centred on the masses of people, in the face-to-face showdown with U.S. imperialism, the chieftain of the world reactionary forces.
					
					 The miraculous successes being made in the DPRK is vivid evidence of the truth that socialism is science and so is its victory.
					
					 To build a peaceful world free from war is the goal the WPK is aiming at: to endeavor for peace and security of the region and the rest of the world is the consistent stance of the WPK.
					
					 The current situation on the Korean peninsula clearly proves that our nuclear weapons are now serving as powerful deterrence that safeguard peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia and guarantee the Korean nation its sovereignty, right to existence and right to development.
					
					 No matter who says what, the WPK will never step back even an inch from the path of Byongjin, and will firmly defend the Korean-style socialism centred on the masses of people. We will root out the U.S. threats of a nuclear war and safeguard peace on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The WPK will continue to stand shoulder to shoulder with the communist and workers' parties of the world in the effort to advance the victory of the cause of socialism, the future of mankind.

articles.title: Head of WPK Delegation Meets Leaders and Figures of Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
Head of WPK Delegation Meets Leaders and Figures of Foreign Political Party
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Su Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK who is leading the WPK delegation participated in the 19th international meeting of communist and workers' parties opened in Russia, respectively met and had talks with the chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party.
					 At the talks, he referred to the fact that the DPRK army and people unanimously turned out in a drive to carry out the tasks set forth by the Second Plenary Meeting of the 7th Central Committee of the WPK under the energetic leadership of the chairman of the WPK.
					
					 He clarified the principled stand of the WPK to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations with foreign parties in the common struggle for opposing imperialism and defending socialism.
					
					 Gennadi Zyuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, expressed his deep thanks for the WPK delegation's participation in the 19th international meeting of communist and workers' parties and the celebrations of the 100th anniversary of the October Socialist Revolution.
					
					 He stressed that he would make positive efforts to further develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and extend full support and solidarity to the WPK in its struggle for building a socialist power and ensuring peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, said that the Workers' Party, the army and the people of Korea have won only victory while facing down the imperialists' military threats and heinous sanctions to isolate and stifle the DPRK under the leadership of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, thus greatly encouraging the progressive political parties and peoples of the world.
					
					 He noted that his party would as ever extend firm support and solidarity to the Workers' Party and people of Korea in their cause of justice and invariably strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Su Gil met with the general secretary of the Communist Party of the People of Spain, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia of the Czech Republic, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and others.

articles.title: 19th IMCWP Expresses Solidarity to Just Cause of WPK and Korean People
articles.content:
19th IMCWP Expresses Solidarity to Just Cause of WPK and Korean People 
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Following is the full text of a statement for solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people which was adopted at the 19th International Meeting of Communist and Workers' Parties (IMCWP).
					 We, participants in the 19th IMCWP, held in St. Petersburg, Russia on November 2-3, 2017 extend wholehearted support to and solidarity with the WPK and the Korean people in the struggle to safeguard the socialist cause and ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region from threats of aggression and war by the U.S.
					
					 The WPK and the Korean people unwaveringly hold high the banner of socialism and victoriously advance the socialist cause even in the face of war threats and sanctions by U.S. imperialism and its followers.
					
					 The communist and workers' parties, in the spirit of international justice and for the sake of global peace and security, strongly condemn and categorically reject the reckless war threats and inhumane sanctions by U.S. imperialism and its followers that seek to obliterate the socialist system of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) and to engulf the Korean peninsula, the region and the entire world in a calamitous nuclear war.
					
					 The just cause of the WPK and the Korean people to build a powerful socialist nation by embodying the people-first principle under the wise leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, is a great contribution to defending and victoriously advancing the socialist cause on the global scale.
					
					 Expressing full support to the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK in which the strong will to fight against U.S. imperialism to the end was declared, we emphatically call upon progressive parties and organizations of the world to step up international solidarity movement in support of the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people in hearty response to the open letter of the Central Committee of the WPK that called for joint action and united front to smash the reckless moves of war and aggression by the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Press Release of DPRK Mission on Sanctions
articles.content:
Press Release of DPRK Mission on Sanctions
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK permanent mission to the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva on Nov. 2 issued the following press release:
					 A press release issued by the Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR) on 27 October 2017 mentioned that the sanctions against the DPRK imposed by the UN Security Council (UNSC) have a negative impact on the population of the country. 
					
					 Today the U.S.-led racket of brutal sanctions and pressure against the DPRK constitutes contemporary human rights violation and genocide and raises concern and condemnation of international community as it threatens and impedes the enjoyment by the people of DPRK of their human rights in all sectors. 
					
					 The "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK which were adopted illegally yielding to the interest and high-handedness of certain countries are illegitimate and unprecedented documents against human rights and remain contravention of universal principles of international law in terms of legal basis, motivation and content. 
					
					 Under the pretext of implementation of such "sanctions resolutions" some unprincipled countries have blocked the delivery of medical equipment and medicines for treatment of patients and for the health of mothers and children destined to the DPRK and created obstacles to the production of educational equipment and nutritional food for children. 
					
					 The despicable sanctions and pressure by hostile forces have even caused abnormal situation whereby most of the assistance activities of international humanitarian organizations which have continued their operation in the DPRK for over 20 years have been thwarted or reduced. 
					
					 The indiscriminate application of sanctions against the DPRK in total disregard of a slightest reference in the UNSC's "sanctions resolution" that prohibits any acts affecting the livelihood of population and humanitarian activities represents nefarious human rights violations infringing upon the principles of humanitarianism and international human rights treaties including the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights (ICESCR), Convention on the Rights of the Child (CRC) and the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women (CEDAW). 
					
					 If the OHCHR and other human rights mechanisms are truly and genuinely devoted to international efforts for promotion and protection of human rights, they should embark on moves to punish and end the U.S.-led inhumane acts of sanctions and pressure, the barbarous human rights violations which are aimed at overthrowing the state and social system of sovereign state rather than taking up non-existent "human rights issue" of the DPRK. 
					
					 All acts of sanctions which run counter to the international promotion and protection of human rights and lofty ideal of humanitarianism should never be justified under whatever circumstances and all types of anti-human rights and inhumane sanctions against the DPRK should be terminated immediately and thoroughly.

articles.title: Spirit of Defending Country in 1950s Is Powerful Ideological Weapon in Anti-U.S. Struggle: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Spirit of Defending Country in 1950s Is Powerful Ideological Weapon in Anti-U.S. Struggle: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday stresses in an article that the spirit of defending the country in the 1950s serves as the most powerful ideological weapon in driving the U.S. imperialists, sworn enemy of the Korean people, into the abyss of ruin and winning the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. which continues century after century.
					 The article says that in fact, the war between the two year-old DPRK and the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world was the hard-fought one just like the fight in which the former faced the outrageous group of gangsters with bare hands.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The victory in the Fatherland Liberation War just like the showdown between a rifle and A-bomb goes to prove that nothing can occupy the service personnel and people who bear in mind the absolute loyalty to their leader and ardent love of theirs and invincible faith.
					
					 Today the U.S. imperialists and their followers are openly revealing their ill-intended inveterate hostility and repugnancy toward the DPRK and getting more frantic in their most barbarous sanctions and pressure upon it to usurp its inviolable social system and every sphere of their life.
					
					 This is driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula into the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 Any move of the enemies can never check the advance of the DPRK which is dashing forward the final victory.
					
					 The daily-increasing moves of the enemies against the DPRK only cement the retaliatory will of its service personnel and people.
					
					 The reality requires all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to more firmly arm themselves with the spirit of the heroic struggle of the preceding generation that beat the U.S. imperialist aggressors for the first time in history and carried forward the tradition of the ever-victorious tradition of Juche Korea and the spirit of defending the country in the 1950s.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Trump about His Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Trump about His Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Americans are pressing for early impeachment of Trump. The main reason is that Trump in a position to issue an order of making a nuclear strike is spiritually instable and his oft-repeated tough remarks against the DPRK can bring about nuclear disaster to the U.S. mainland.
					 Dignitaries such as Corker, chairman of the Foreign Relations Committee of the U.S. Senate, and former officials said that the president is uselessly escalating tension with the DPRK and he has to halt the reckless blackmail and take hands off the Korean affairs.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday ridicules that if Trump is not deaf, he must hear such assertions.
					
					 However, Trump has not yet come to his senses but is seriously stimulating the DPRK by making foolish remarks, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Nobody can predict when Trump does a reckless act. The only and one way for checking his rash act is to tame him with absolute physical power.
					
					 If the U.S. misjudges the DPRK's toughest will and dares to act recklessly, the latter will be compelled to deal a resolute and merciless punishment upon the former with the mobilisation of all forces. The U.S. has no energy to prevent it. Then its regret is too late.
					
					 We warn Trump's coteries once again. If they want to get rid of ruin, do not make reckless remarks.

articles.title: More Protests against Trump's Junket Planned in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Protests against Trump's Junket Planned in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- S. Korean organizations reportedly plan to simultaneously launch a campaign against Trump across south Korea on November 7 and 8.
					 The Joint Action against Trump comprised of more than 220 political parties and organizations set the above-said days as the period of 24-hour intensive action and said that it planned to hold large-scale meeting against the junket by Trump, a war maniac, outside Chongwadae, "National Assembly" building, lodging place for Trump and other places.
					
					 The puppet police is running amuck in crackdown such as the arrest of more than 20 students who held a demonstration on Nov. 3, claiming that 109 meetings are to take place only in downtown Seoul during the period of Trump's junket.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye' Stooges Doomed to Imprisonment
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye' Stooges Doomed to Imprisonment
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Those who served traitor Park Geun Hye at Chongwadae during her stay in office are said to have embezzled public money in an organizational way, according to the south Korean online paper MT on Nov. 1.
					 Ri Pyong Gi, former chief of the puppet Intelligence Service, gave instructions to offer 5 millions won a month for special activities shortly after he was appointed as presidential chief of secretary, claiming that his office suffered difficulties from limited budget.
					
					 In particular, Park's faithful servants, An Pong Gun, Ri Jae Man and Jong Ho Song filled their own pockets with a huge amount of money.
					
					 An was offered one hundred millions won a month and Ri 50 millions won.
					
					 The puppet prosecution arrested them on charges of embezzlement of about 4 billions won.

articles.title: Conservative Opposition Parties Warned
articles.content:
Conservative Opposition Parties Warned
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper OhmyNews, the Pusan People's Solidarity for Solidarity accused the coteries of the conservative opposition parties for working hard to get rid of the judgment by the candlelight demonstrators on November 1.
					 The organization asserted that if the "Liberal Korea Party" and the "Parun Party", main targets in cleaning up deep-rooted evils, have an iota of conscience, they should admit their crimes of having massively spawned the evils though belatedly and face a stern judgment by candlelight demonstrators.
					
					 It warned that if the conservative opposition parties try to halt the campaign of cleaning up the evils, the people will not remain a passive onlooker.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Italy
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty posted respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" on the website of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy on October 29.

articles.title: Venezuelan Organization Praises Korean Socialism
articles.content:
Venezuelan Organization Praises Korean Socialism 
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Korean socialism will be invincible forever as the DPRK has the great leaders generation after generation.
					 The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at a university of Venezuela said this in an article which it posted on the internet homepage Juche Idea on October 20.
					
					 The article said that the Korean people have dynamically hastened socialist construction, resolutely frustrating the frantic sanctions of the U.S. and its vassals to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Many people who visited the DPRK say that this country has not only defended its existence, standing against the imperialists and dominationists during several decades, but also stepped up the building a socialist power thanks to the great leaders.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, is the greatest man recognized by the whole world.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il is a peerlessly great man as he firmly defended and glorified Korean-style socialism despite the world-wide great political upheaval.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as socialist main political mode and turned the DPRK into an invincible power.
					
					 The DPRK today greets the golden age of its development under Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean army and people have created changes and miracles of the century in all fields, holding aloft the banner of the self-reliance and self-development under the leadership of Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Su Gil interviene en XIX Encuentro Internacional de Partidos Comunistas y Obreros
articles.content:
Kim Su Gil interviene en XIX Encuentro Internacional de Partidos Comunistas y Obreros
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El jefe de la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Su Gil, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y presidente del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, pronuncio el dia 2 un discurso en el XIX Encuentro Internacional de Partidos Comunistas y Obreros, efectuado en la ciudad de San Petersburgo de Rusia.
					Kim dijo que la gran Revolucion Socialista de Octubre, que tuvo lugar en 1917 en Rusia, devino un hito historico que permitio a las masas trabajadoras realizar su largo sueno sobre una sociedad ideal, la libre de explotacion y opresion donde todos lleven una vida feliz.
					
					La historia de la humanidad en la ultima centuria muestra que el capitalismo no puede ofrecer la dignidad y la felicidad a las masas populares por su naturaleza reaccionaria y contradicciones estructurales, mientras el socialismo es el unico futuro de la humanidad por su eterna viabilidad proveniente de su caracter cientifico y veracidad, apunto Kim y anadio:
					
					El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, aclaro en su historico informe presentado ante el VII Congreso del PTC que el socialismo es el ideal comun de la humanidad y es una ley de desarrollo de la historia que el pueblo se dirija al socialismo.
					
					En medio de la aguda confrontacion entre el socialismo y el capitalismo, el PTC levanto en alto la bandera socialista y construyo el socialismo al estilo coreano, centrado en las masas populares, enfrentandose directamente con el imperialismo norteamericano, caudillo de las fuerzas reaccionarias del mundo.
					
					Los exitos asombrosos, que se logran en nuestro pais, comprueban con hechos que el socialismo y su victoria son una ciencia.
					
					Construir un mundo pacifico sin guerra y luchar por la paz y seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo son la meta de lucha y la posicion invariable del PTC.
					
					La situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana comprueba que las armas nucleares de la RPDC constituyen el potente disuasivo para defender firmemente la paz y la seguridad de la peninsula y la region del Nordeste Asiatico y garantizar el derecho de la nacion coreana a la independencia, la subsistencia y el desarrollo frustrando las maniobras agresivas y las tentativas de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, el PTC defendera el socialismo al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares sin retroceder de su camino de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares y salvaguardara la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region eliminando de raiz la amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Al igual que en el pasado, el PTC marchara siempre hombro con hombro junto con los partidos comunistas y de trabajo de varios paises para cumplir con adelanto la causa socialista que es el futuro de la humanidad.

articles.title: Kim Su Gil se reune con lideres de partido y personalidades de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Su Gil se reune con lideres de partido y personalidades de varios paises
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Su Gil, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, quien participa en calidad del jefe de la delegacion del PTC en la XIX reunion internacional de los partidos comunistas y del trabajo, que se efectua en Rusia, se reunio por separados con los presidentes del CC del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa y del Partido del Trabajo de Hungria.
					En las ocasiones, Kim senalo que bajo la dinamica direccion del Presidente del PTC, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos se levantaron como un solo hombre a la lucha por la materializacion de las tareas presentadas en el 2o pleno del septimo periodo del CC del PTC.
					
					Expreso la posicion de principio del PTC de estrechar y desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los partidos de varios paises en la lucha conjunta contra el imperialismo y por defender el socialismo.
					
					Gennadi Zhuganov, presidente de CC del PCFR, expreso profundo agradecimiento a la presencia de la delegacion de PTC en la XIX reunion internacional de los partidos comunistas y del trabajo y el acto conmemorativo del centenario de la Revolucion Socialista de Octubre.
					
					Enfatizo que se esforzara por ampliar y desarrollar mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos partidos y enviara el apoyo total y solidaridad a la lucha del PTC por la construccion de la potencia socialista y la preservacion de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Gyula Thurmer, presidente del Partido de los Trabajadores Comunistas de Hungria, dijo que bajo la guia del estimado Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el PTC y el ejercito y pueblo coreanos logran solo las victorias frustrando la amenaza militar y las brutales maniobras de sancion y aplastamiento de los imperialistas, lo cual infunde gran conviccion y animacion a los partidos y pueblos progresistas del mundo.
					
					Afirmo que en el futuro tambien enviara el firme apoyo y solidaridad a la justa causa del PTC y el pueblo y estrechara invariablemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el PTC.
					
					Por otra parte, el jefe de la delegacion del PTC departio por separados con el secretario general del Partido Comunista de los Pueblos de Espana, el presidente de CC del Partido Comunista de Cechy-Morava, el secretario general de CC del Partido del Trabajo de Bangladesh y el secretario internacional de CC del Partido Comunista de Cuba.

articles.title: Encuentro internacional se solidariza con la justa causa del pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Encuentro internacional se solidariza con la justa causa del pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En el XIX Encuentro Internacional de Partidos Comunistas y Obreros fue adoptada una declaracion solidaria en apoyo a la justa causa del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del pueblo coreano.
					Su texto integro sigue:
					
					Nosotros, los participantes del XIX Encuentro Internacional de Partidos Comunistas y Obreros que tuvo lugar en San Peterburgo, Rusia, de 2 a 3 de noviembre del 2017, expresamos el apoyo y la solidaridad de manera incondicional a la lucha del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano a fin de defender la causa socialista ante la agresion y las amenazas de guerra del imperialismo yanqui y preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y de la region.
					
					Aun hoy en dia el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y pueblo coreano proporcionan avances victoriosos de la causa socialista sosteniendose inalterablemente la bandera del socialismo en medio de las amenazas de guerra y sanciones del imperialismo estadounidense y sus satelites.
					
					Los Partidos Comunistas y Obreros, aspirantes de la justicia internacional y de la paz y la seguridad, condenan y rechazan de maneras categorica y energica los imprudentes actos de amenaza y sanciones inhumanas del imperialismo yanqui y sus satelites enfrascados en destruir el regimen socialista en la RPD de Corea y causar desastres de la guerra nuclear en la peninsula y la region asi como en el mundo entero.
					
					La causa justa del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano destinada a construir una potencia socialista tomando como base la maxima prioridad a las masas populares bajo la sabia direccion del camarada Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, ha hecho un gran aporte, a nivel planetaria, a la salvaguardia y el victorioso avance de la causa socialista.
					
					Manifestando el total apoyo a la Declaracion del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPD de Corea donde puso de relieve la firme y voluntad de resistencia contra el imperialismo yanqui y un respaldo activo a la Carta abierta del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea a traves de la cual ha hecho un llamamiento por la accion coherente y la necesidad del frente comun antiimperialistas a fin de asestar un golpe contundente a los actos imprudentes de agresion y de guerra del imperialismo yanqui, exhortamos con vehemencia, a todos los partidos politicos y organizaciones progresistas del mundo, a promover aun mas activo el movimiento de apoyo y de solidaridad en respaldo a la justa causa del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Representacion Permanente de la RPDC publica comunicado sobre las sanciones
articles.content:
Representacion Permanente de la RPDC publica comunicado sobre las sanciones
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La Representacion Permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la Oficina de la ONU y las organizaciones internacionales en Ginebra publico el dia 2 el siguiente comunicado:
					Un comunicado de prensa publicado el 27 de octubre por la Oficina del Alto Comisionado de la ONU para los Derechos Humanos menciono que las sanciones impuestas por el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tienen el impacto negativo en la vida poblacional.
					
					La actual campana de sancion y presion brutales, patrocinada por EE.UU. contra la RPDC, constituyen la violacion de DDHH y el genocidio de version contemporanea y despiertan la atencion y condena de la comunidad internacional porque amenazan e impiden el disfrute de DDHH por el pueblo coreano en todos sus sectores.
					
					Las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC, que fueron adoptadas ilegalmente a favor de los intereses y bajo la coaccion de ciertos paises, son ilegitimos e inauditos documentos anti-DDHH que contravienen a los principios universales de la ley internacional en su base legal, motivacion y contenido. 
					
					Bajo el pretexto de implementacion de las "resoluciones de sancion", algunos paises flojos bloquearon el envio a la RPDC de los equipos medicos y medicinas para el tratamiento de los pacientes y para la salud de madres y ninos e incluso, obstaculizan la produccion de equipamiento educacional y alimentos nutricionales para la infancia.
					
					La despreciable campana de sancion y presion de las fuerzas hostiles han causado tambien la situacion anormal en que resulto abortada o reducida la mayoria de las actividades de asistencia de las organizaciones humanitarias internacionales que continuaron por mas de 20 anos en la RPDC.
					
					La aplicacion indiscriminada de sanciones contra la RPDC en total desprecio a la ligera referencia de la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, que prohibe cualquier acto que afecte la vida poblacional y las actividades humanitarias, representa la violacion flagrante de DDHH que infringe los principios de humanitarismo y los tratados internacionales de la misma materia, inclusive el Convenio sobre los Derechos Economicos, Sociales y Culturales, la Convencion de Derechos de la Infancia y la Convencion de Eliminacion de Todas Formas de Discriminacion contra la Mujer.
					
					Si la Oficina del Alto Comisionado de la ONU para los DDHH y otros mecanismos de DDHH estan interesados realmente en los esfuerzos internacionales por la promocion y proteccion de DDHH, ellos deberian incorporarse a los movimientos para rechazar y poner punto final a los actos inhumanos de sancion y presion, patrocinados por EE.UU., y las violaciones barbaras de DDHH encaminadas a derrocar el sistema estatal y social del Estado soberano, en lugar de cuestionar el inexistente "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC.
					
					Todos los actos de sancion, que van en contra de la promocion y proteccion de DDHH en la arena internacional y del adorable ideal de humanitarismo, no pueden ser justificados en ningun caso y todos los tipos de sanciones anti-DDHH e inhumanas deben ser terminados inmediata e incondicionalmente.
